cu.explanation_en: Setting the remote SCTP control port to an out-of-range value of 99999 will cause SCTP connection failures and prevent F1 interface establishment.

du.explanation_en: Setting the uplink carrier bandwidth to an invalid value of 999 will cause frequency configuration errors and prevent proper uplink channel setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將上行鏈路載波頻寬設定為無效值 999 會導致頻率配置錯誤，並阻止正確的上行鏈路通道設定。
